intro.ledger-grid: This page shows your upcoming transactions forcasted based on the schedule you defined. It is often helpful if you want to have a look at the upcoming transactions, or make a detailed review and analysis of where the money will go. It will highlight transactions in yellow if they make any of your accounts go below $50 or in red if they cause an overdraft.
intro.schedule-wizard-button: Click this button to schedule a new transaction. Let's try and plan a hefty once-a-year transaction, such as a birthday party or Black Friday.
